Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.interfaces

Class StatusViewer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.interfaces.StatusViewer
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClosingViewer, GameOverViewer, GamePreparationViewer, LoginViewer, NewGameViewer, NumberPlayerViewer, PlayingViewer, ReadyViewer, RequestResumingViewer, ResumingViewer, WaitingViewer
public abstract class StatusViewer
extends java.lang.Object
Class used to retrieve the various viewer for CLI, GUI, WTerminal, and all the Viewers connected to one Status
Author:
giorgio
